attributes.action: Stop ALL covid 19 restrictions! Let us live and be free!
attributes.additional_details:
Its destroying people's lives and the economy. Business are closing. Dreams are being distroyed. It has already been confirmed that the virus has the same death and recovery rate as the flu! 

Enough is enough now. Fair enough keep the local lock downs for big out breaks but what is the point in keeping people depressed and living in fear
attributes.background: For months now we have been told what we can and can't do. Mental health has suffered, children, business weddings. Enough is enough stop all the restrictions and just let us live our lives no point in living life this way for something that is never going to go

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are very similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315979
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313310

You might also be interested in this article about comparisons with flu:

https://fullfact.org/online/flu-covid-death-certificates/
